thread.section_title: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia | eglobaldigitalcameras.com.au
thread.title: Sue Kinane
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Sue Kinane

author: Sue Kinane
title: Sue Kinane
text: The online shopping process was simple and easy to use. Whilst I thought postage was a little high, the overall cost was still cheaper than I could find in Perth. The cameras arrived within a couple of days. I would recommend eGlobal and wouldn't hesitate to buy from them again.
